content:
I usually try not to use shellfish tongs.
Because I can't properly
control my strength.

content:
About conversation topics... (thinking)
Those shellfish tongs in your hand,
they're also a dangerous tool.

content:
I once cracked my client's pet turtle's shell
with shellfish tongs, right in front of them.
Oh, don't worry, it survived. I patched up its shell.
